sourcesContent:
import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react'; import { Container, Button, Row, Col, ListGroup, Image, Dropdown } from 'react-bootstrap'; import products from '../product'; import './CartPage.css'; export function CartPage() { const productsInCart = products.slice(0,2); let priceSum = 0; productsInCart.map(product => { priceSum = priceSum + product.price; }) return (

Your Cart

 {productsInCart.map(product => (

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price}

{product.countInStock > 0 ? "In Stock": "Out of stock"}

 Quantity 1 2 3 4 5 ))}

Subtotal

${priceSum}

Free shipping to V8N3R9, arrive on Thu Sep 21, 2021

 ) }
